name: Uforia
description:
Uforia is a 2D adventure game with narrative elements. The game was solo developed for a graduation project on the topic of story-driven indie games.

- There are 3 stages to explore, each with their own boss fight. 

- There is a shop where you can buy upgrades and play a fun mini-game.

- There is an intricate dialogue system with colors and animations.

- The game is accompanied by a great 8-bit soundtrack!

Currently, gameplay lasts around ~30 minutes.

The game is still in beta, so let me know if you encounter any bugs or if you would like to see something added in the future. Thanks!
